comments.body: I couldn't find the original code (the reference above refers to http://www.hackersdelight.org/permissions.htm which is no longer available) and the link you point to has no license so if you copied from there its use is IMO problematic.
I added the archive link since the website is no longer available.
the original implementation could be found at https://web.archive.org/web/20190108224909/http://www.hackersdelight.org/hdcodetxt/divmnu64.c.txt
Thanks. The code seems like a re-implementation of the link so I think we are OK.
